CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE TRIGGER "DYMON"."AD_EBA_CUST_CUSTOMERS" after delete on eba_cust_customers for each row begin insert into eba_cust_history (table_name, component_rowkey, component_id, column_name, old_value, new_value) values ('CUSTOMERS', :old.row_key, :old.id, 'CUSTOMER_REMOVED', substr(:old.customer_name,0,4000), null ); end ad_eba_cust_customers;
ALTER TRIGGER "DYMON"."AD_EBA_CUST_CUSTOMERS" ENABLE
